bug.author: saihv
bug.summary: Possible inconsistency in documentation about "SimMode" parameter
bug.description: The documentation about settings.json states that SimMode has to be "" or "Multirotor" for simulating a drone, whereas <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/blob/master/Unreal/Plugins/AirSim/Source/SimHUD/SimHUD.cpp#L207>in the code</denchmark-link> , looks like the SimMode value is being checked against "Quadrotor".
